Sion

Group (2023-present):
NCT WISH

Introduction

Sion is a South Korean singer under SM Entertainment. He is a member of NCT and the leader of its sub-unit NCT Wish.

On June 28, 2023, Sion and Yushi were announced as new members of SM Entertainment's trainee team SMROOKIES, and future members of NCT Wish. They debuted on February 21, 2024, with the single "Wish".
